phrases: Looks like the binding of her ring did not hold up.
These Sleigh Beggy children just get weaker and weaker.
You need to get in her shadows.
Hey, snap out of it, thorn child.
We cannot show her to a human doctor, can we?
Silky, we are going to be away for a while.
The entrance to the land of the fairies.
You refused to enter when you last came here.
To think that now I am taking you inside...
Do not worry, we just met a good doctor.
She is a bit of an oddball, though.
I am taking the bandage off your eyes.
This is one of the fairy kingdoms.
It is called The Ant Hill.
Your skin and veins could not withstand the excess magic that was created in your body.
It is being held back by that charm for now.
You could have gotten more proper treatment at a human hospital.
The fairy king is so selfish.
He brought you here because he wanted you here on this side.
I am a fairy, raised by human parents whose child I was swapped with.
I am sure she is fine.
I thank you for your concern.
It is my duty to help when a child is in danger.
should not you two live in this world?
Like humans and animals, some fairies can be ailed by sickness and age.
He is near enough to come if we call for him.
I have been told that he is your husband.
Are you able to communicate with him well?
The people of this side have trouble understanding certain things with humans.
H-He is not so much my husband as he is my magic instructor.
Let us just leave it at that, then.
It is only been three days!
I told you, the patients are my priority.
Hey, it is a Sleigh Beggy.
Do not touch her so casually!
We are having mushroom soup today.
He is the former human that was raised here in my place.
We lived for half a century, swapped into each other's worlds.
When an ordinary human spends a long time here,
The human world is toxic to the soul.
The toxins in the soul soon consume the body.
That may be fine for you, but Chise...
Say, Elias, she is closer to this side.
If you truly care for her,
she would find happiness if you allowed her to abandon humanity.
For a while, I worked at a human hospital, believing I was human.
That is when Shanahan came to retrieve me.
Which is why I am here now.
It scares people when you age so little.
You do not need to apologize.
It is in the instinct of the weak to be afraid of the strange.
I committed myself to my work and lived a proper life.
I have nothing to be ashamed of.
The water here is effective on wounds.
We need to heal your open wounds first.
As a fae, I am unconditionally attracted to Sleigh Beggies.
I do not understand human minds very well yet, but I want to learn.
Your kind always pity or mock me, do you not?
I do not wish for that.
The humans are the ones who fear me,
but it was always a human who accepted me.
You do not need to keep your head down.
I want her to continue living as a human.
The will of a living being can sometimes be the most powerful thing of all.
The desire to live can bring you back from the brink of death.
That is especially clear on this side.
However, even when you would lost a fatal amount of blood, you showed no such spirit.
That is why your wounds would not heal.
As a doctor, no matter how much you do not want to live, I will keep you alive.
Because I want you to live.
Silky, we are going to be away for a while.
You do not need to be mean.
It is got to be upsetting for the family she is possessed to have passed.
Hey, dear, you should go somewhere else.
Your family's not here to hear your voice anymore.
Hey, hey, I heard there are some hot guys in that town over there.
What is a banshee doing out here?
They are a pious family that observes old traditions well.
But a home, even if a house is to crumble, is not lost, as long as people live.
As long as just one person lives, there you will find light.
If there is no light to shine on you, it is your turn to protect the light.
You have the appearance of a silver flower.
It is much better than seeing you vanish like foam.
You do not need to thank me.
It is our duty as protectors to aid the weak.
Elias, um, I can walk now.
Even I could tell I was shocked.
But, as long as you are still alive, I am content with that.
Time passes differently on either side.
Hang on, I am going to light the furnace.
Things seem kind of different inside.
Sorry we were gone for so long.
I cannot believe it is winter already, either.
I am about to spend my first Christmas with the mage.
What does the girl find in the town of London in the end-of-the-year rush?
Let us go look for a present together, then.
